root.name: Age of Wonders: Shadow Magic
root.description: OverviewThe game lets you choose from dozens of races, traits and schools of magic. When you made your choice you find yourself in a vast (depending the map) world, with the majority of it obscured from view by a fog of war. It is your task to raise cities, recruit new troops and advance your magic research. Meanwhile, you can recruit heroes and send them out to explore the lands, fight myriads of monsters, hunt for treasure and so forth.
